title: [Minecraft.net | MINECRAFT BUILDS] 令人啧啧赞叹的医疗中心
author: Sinbad_Official
txt_content:
MINECRAFT BUILDSMarvelous Medical Complex
令人啧啧赞叹的医疗中心
Built by Nacho Blas
由Nacho Blas建造

Jess Robinson


Set in a lush green Minecraft forest,Nacho Blas recreated the Medical Complex of the Complutense University of Madrid in a 1:1 scale. This historical building was planned in 1927 and completed in the 30s. Numerous teachers of Spanish medicine, great researchers, and prestigious doctors have been professors here. Thank your Nacho Blash for sharing your build and historical pride!
坐落在Minecraft中的一片生机勃勃的森林里的，是Nacho Blas 以等比例还原的 马德里康普卢腾斯大学(Complutense University of Madrid) 的医疗中心。在现实中，这座建筑始建于1927年，在30年代竣工。有很多专攻西班牙医学的著名的老师、研究人员以及医生都曾于此担任过教授一职。让我们感谢 Nacho Blash 向我们分享他的建筑并带来独属于我们历史上的骄傲！
Do you have a great build you’d like to show everyone? Feel free to send your screenshots (and a little information about your structure) to FeatureMe@minecraft.net and you may just see yours highlighted here!

你也迫不及待地向大伙分享你的巧夺天工的建筑吗？只要向 FeatureMe@minecraft.net 发送你的地图截图以及一小段介绍，你就也会在 Minecraft.net 上获得你的高光时刻！




【Sinbad 译自官网 2020 年 05 月 28 日发布的 Marvelous Medical Complex；原作者 Jess Robinson】
【本文排版借助了：SPX】
